mapper.select: SELECT /* MybatisSampleDao.allScientists */ A.id , A.name , A.birth_year , A.death_year , A.fos_cd , J.cd_nmm AS fos_nm FROM pt_scientist A LEFT OUTER JOIN sy_code J ON A.fos_cd = J.cd AND J.cd_grp = 'FOS' ORDER BY A.birth_year DESC

SELECT /* MybatisSampleDao.findScientistById */ A.id , A.name , A.birth_year , A.death_year , A.fos_cd , (SELECT S.cd_nm from sy_code S WHERE S.cd_grp = 'FOS' AND A.fos_cd = S.cd) AS fos_nm , A.create_id , A.create_time , (SELECT mgr_name FROM au_manager WHERE id = A.create_id) AS create_name , A.modify_id , A.modify_time , (SELECT mgr_name FROM au_manager WHERE id = A.modify_id) AS modify_name FROM pt_scientist A WHERE A.id = #{id}

SELECT /* MybatisSampleDao.findScientists */ A.id , A.name , A.birth_year , A.death_year , A.fos_cd , (SELECT S.cd_nm from sy_code S WHERE S.cd_grp = 'FOS' AND A.fos_cd = S.cd) AS fos_nm FROM pt_scientist A ORDER BY A.birth_year DESC

SELECT /* MybatisSampleDao.searchScientists */ A.id , A.name , A.birth_year , A.death_year , A.fos_cd , (SELECT S.cd_nm from sy_code S WHERE S.cd_grp = 'FOS' AND A.fos_cd = S.cd) AS fos_nm , A.create_id , A.create_time , (SELECT mgr_name FROM au_manager WHERE id = A.create_id) AS create_name , A.modify_id , A.modify_time , (SELECT mgr_name FROM au_manager WHERE id = A.modify_id) AS modify_name FROM pt_scientist A
AND UPPER(A.name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{name}) || '%'
AND UPPER(A.fos_cd) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{fosCd}) || '%'
ORDER BY A.birth_year DESC
